    • CharacterDetailsServiceImpl

      @Autowired public CharacterDetailsServiceImpl(org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper, CharacterContextRepository characterContextRepository, CharacterDetailsRepository characterDetailsRepository, CharacterIllustrationRepository characterIllustrationRepository, CharacterJsonDataService characterJsonDataService)
      Constructor for the CharacterDetailsServiceImpl.
      Parameters:
      modelMapper - The ModelMapper for mapping entities to models.
      characterContextRepository - The repository for accessing character context data.
      characterDetailsRepository - The repository for accessing character details data.
      characterIllustrationRepository - The repository for accessing character illustration.
      characterJsonDataService - The service for accessing character JSON data.

    • updateCharacterDetails

      public CharacterDetailsEntity updateCharacterDetails(Long id, CharacterFullModel model)
      Updates an existing character's details.
      Specified by:
      updateCharacterDetails in interface CharacterDetailsService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character to update.
      model - The updated character data.
      Returns:
      The updated CharacterDetailsEntity.
      Throws:
      CharacterDetailsNotFoundException - if no character details are found for the given ID.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided details in the model are null.

    • getAllCharacters

      public List<CharacterDetailsModel> getAllCharacters()
      Retrieves a list of all character details.
      Specified by:
      getAllCharacters in interface CharacterDetailsService
      Returns:

    • getAllCharactersFull

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<CharacterFullModel> getAllCharactersFull()

      Specified by:
      getAllCharactersFull in interface CharacterDetailsService
      Returns:
